description.value: A set of codes that define the reason a list may be incomplete.

definition.value: Items excluded due to confidentiality and/or patient preferences.
Patient record transfer from previous GP practice not yet complete; any information recorded before dd-mmm-yyyy has been excluded.
Patient data may be incomplete as there is data supplied by a third party awaiting review before becoming available.
